net.sf.javaml.tools
Class DatasetTools

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.javaml.tools.DatasetTools

public final class DatasetTools
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides utility methods on data sets.

Version:
0.1.5
Author:
Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
See Also:
Dataset, DefaultDataset

Method Detail

merge

public static void merge(Dataset... datasets)
All data will be merged together in the first supplied data set.

Parameters:
datasets - a number of data sets

bootstrap

@Deprecated
public static Dataset bootstrap(Dataset data,
                                           int size,
                                           java.util.Random rg)
Deprecated. 

Generate a bootstrap sample from the data set with a particular size, using the given random generator. This is done by sampling with replacement.

Parameters:
data - data set to bootstrap from
size - number of instances in the output data
rg - random generator to use for the bootstrapping
Returns:
bootstrap of the supplied data

maxAttributes

public static Instance maxAttributes(Dataset data)
Create an instance that contains all the maximum values for the attributes.

Parameters:
data - data set to find minimum attribute values for
Returns:
Instance representing the minimum values for each attribute

public static Instance minAttributes(Dataset data)
Create an instance that contains all the minimum values for the attributes.

Parameters:
data - data set to calculate minimum attribute values for
Returns:
Instance representing all minimum attribute values

standardDeviation

public static Instance standardDeviation(Dataset data,
                                         Instance avg)
Creates an instance that contains the standard deviation of the values for each attribute.

Parameters:
data - data set to calculate attribute value standard deviations for
avg - the average instance for the data set
Returns:
Instance representing the standard deviation of the values for each attribute

average

public static Instance average(Dataset data)
Creates an instance that contains the average values for the attributes.

Parameters:
data - data set to calculate average attribute values for
Returns:
Instance representing the average attribute values

percentile

public static Instance percentile(Dataset data,
                                  double perc)
Calculates the percentile hinge for a given percentile.

Parameters:
data - data set to calculate percentile for
perc - percentile to calculate, Q1=25, Q2=median=50,Q3=75
Returns:

createInstanceFromClass

public static Instance createInstanceFromClass(Dataset data)
Creates an Instance from the class labels over all Instances in a data set. The indices of the class labels are used because the class labels can be any Object.

Parameters:
data - data set to create class label instance for
Returns:
instance with class label indices as values.
